resources.string: Please remember to call the clients indicated here
Hello {0}, You are \'Almost there\'! Tomorrow is day 7. REMEMBER to go for PrePex removal at Chingwere Clinic
The Day 6 SMS reminder message will be sent out to {0} client{1} listed. Do you want to proceed?
No clients to SMS for this day
Warning, a reminder message has already been sent. Do you still want to send the same message

Head of the household Education Attainment

Quantity Kept for Consumption at home

Borrowed, gift from friends or relatives
How much did you spend on these food items over the past 7 Days?
Vegetables- tomatoes, onions, green pepper, cabbage, egg plants
Fruits- pineapples, mangoes, oranges, apples, pawpaws, watermelon,
Meat- beef, pork, lamb, goat, rabbit, wild game, chicken, duck, other birds
Legumes- ground nuts, beans, soya, peas,
Oils and fats- oil, fats or butter added to food or used for cooking
Sweets- sugar, honey, sugarcane, sugary foods
Spices and condiments- ginger, tea, coffee
How long did your food stocks (annual harvest) last from the previous farming season?
If food does not last the whole year, What are the reasons?
